sentence.text: High mobility group A2 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) plays a crucial role in the development of cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: However, the mechanism by which negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II promotes the growth of hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation) remains unclear.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
